Key Match Events: England's poor pressing has been criticized, with Slovenia looking to capitalize on this weakness, especially striker Benjamin Sesko and his lethal right boot.
Pre-Game Insights: Slovenia's midfielder Timi Max Elsnik has warned England that they will be taking shots from distance because they don't believe Gareth Southgate's side will bother to close them down.
Slovenia do not fear England, and a draw should be enough to see them through on three points.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Slovenia's players believe that England's poor pressing can be exploited, especially from outside the box.
Others: England still lead the group on four points, but will be keen for a strong display in their final game of the Euro 2024 group stage.
